src:
Calaverita con sabor a ‘impeachment’ para Trump | Videocaricatura
 by Redacción / AG



En tanto, este domingo el filtrador de la petición del presidente de EU, Donald Trump, a su similar ucraniano Volodymyr Zelenskyi, para investigar al hijo del exvicepresidente Joe Biden, está dispuesto a contestar preguntas de legisladores republicanos de manera directa. Mark Zaid, abogado del hasta ahora desconocido que filtró detalles de la conversación telefónica entre ambos mandatarios, señaló a CBS que ya estableció contacto con el representante republicano Devin Nunes para informarle el ofrecimiento de su cliente.
text:
Ver impeachment ’flavored skull for Trump | Videocaricature
 by Drafting / AG



Meanwhile, this Sunday the filter of the request of the US president, Donald Trump, to his similar Ukrainian Volodymyr Zelenskyi, to investigate the son of former vice president Joe Biden, is willing to answer questions from Republican legislators directly. Mark Zaid, lawyer of the hitherto unknown who leaked details of the telephone conversation between both leaders, told CBS that he already contacted the Republican representative Devin Nunes to inform him of his client's offer.
